entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
